about_the_game:
You take a suspiciously appetizing contract despite being a bit new to how business goes in space. Biting off more than you can chew resulted in having serious threat to your existence.
Now you will have to grow your power to adapt and overcome this mess. You have some allies, but it's not going to be easy getting out a chase that turned into persecution.

  • Constant gameplay variety.
    Cosmic Persecution features shifts between runner, platformer, survival and puzzle objectives. Each with battles which you won't get past.

  • Make optimal decisions.
    Some of the levels will require a more tactical approach while giving you specific target, others will feature nonlinear structure, allowing you to choose your path.

  • Imposing Arsenal.
    Lots of elaborately designed futuristic firearms and energy weapons, each serving its own purpose.

  • Parkour elements.
    Use air maneuvers, sliding and crouching to evade obstacles and enemy attacks. Choose a character, which air mobility capabilities suit your playstyle most.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains pixelated depiction of blood.

short_description: Experience both being a one man army as well as running for your life in this intense action packed platformer. Maneuver between precarious environments and equip a cosmonaut of your choice with space-era weaponry to oppose overwhelming enemy forces.
